body_html: I understand what you mean now. The issue you're seeing is because there's an internally dynamic shape but the shape inference at the Keras level is static. (As we integrate more native Keras support we will have more static checks at the Keras level to identify these issues and give appropriate error messages).
body_text: I understand what you mean now.  The issue you're seeing is because there's an internally dynamic shape but the shape inference at the Keras level is static.  (As we integrate more native Keras support we will have more static checks at the Keras level to identify these issues and give appropriate error messages).
body: I understand what you mean now.  The issue you're seeing is because there's an internally dynamic shape but the shape inference at the Keras level is static.  (As we integrate more native Keras support we will have more static checks at the Keras level to identify these issues and give appropriate error messages).
